outputs.output_descr: The project will build capacity for negotiating, regulating and monitoring investment contracts in the extractive sector. The project will use local and international expertise to deliver training workshops which will involve Attorney General Chambers, Ministry of Energy and Minerals, Ministry of Natural Resources and Tourism  and other public entities involved in negotiating investment contracts. The project will collaborate closely with the Regional Project for Negotiating, and Regulating Investment Contracts based Dakar, Senegal in order to leverage availability of international expertise.

project_descr: Capacity Development for contract negion in the extractive industries.
project_title: CAP. DEV. FOR NEGOTIATING & REGULATING INVEST. CONTRACTS
